**Edited <time datetime="2023-04-24T21:55:07Z" title="04/24/2023 09:55  PM" data-short="1 yr">April 24, 2023</time> by BSOM180**
BACE Pack by Nova is a good one. It now has working docking parts too apparently!

Deleted

**Edited <time datetime="2023-04-24T21:55:15Z" title="04/24/2023 09:55  PM" data-short="1 yr">April 24, 2023</time> by BSOM180**

> 
> BACE Pack by Nova is a good one. It now has working docking parts too apparently!

What? It hasn\'t even been updated. Why would you think that?
It has parts that may have 'docking' in their name or descriptions, but they are just struts and don\'t actually do anything.

Deleted

**Edited <time datetime="2023-04-24T21:55:55Z" title="04/24/2023 09:55  PM" data-short="1 yr">April 24, 2023</time> by BSOM180**

The good news is that since docking was almost finished for this update they\'re going to have a lot more time to polish it and add nearby features for the next one, we won\'t have to wait for an update after release for it to be useful.
Try looking into the Kosmos SSPP- it\'s a very extensive pack for space stations and such.
